original_text: Then King Jehoahaz asked the Lord for help. The Lord saw that the king of Syria was being very cruel to Israel, so he answered the prayer of Jehoahaz.
korean_text: 아람 왕이 이스라엘을 학대하므로 여호아하스가 여호와께 간구하매 여호와께서 들으셨으니 이는 그들이 학대받음을 보셨음이라

sentences.original_text: Then King Jehoahaz asked the Lord for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호아하스 왕이 주께 도움을 구했다

sentences.original_text: The Lord saw that the king of Syria was being very cruel to Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서는 시리아 왕이 이스라엘에게 매우 잔인하게 행하고 있음을 보셨다

sentences.original_text: so he answered the prayer of Jehoahaz
